entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 6:29AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Storm To Hit West Coast of Alaska Tonight And Monday... A very strong storm moving northeast across the Bering Sea on today will move to near St Lawrence Island on Monday, and to just west of the Bering Strait on Tuesday.
